servingHoldReasons.description: Reasons for holding the creative from serving.

items.description: List of reasons for holding the creative.

lastModifiedAt.description: The timestamp when the creative was last modified.

lastModifiedBy.description: The user who last modified the creative.

content.description: The actual content of the creative.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the creative was created.

isTest.description: Boolean indicating if the creative is a test creative.

createdBy.description: The user who created the creative.

status.description: The current status of the creative review.

rejectionReasons.description: Reasons why the creative was rejected during review.

isServing.description: Boolean indicating if the creative is currently serving.

campaign.description: The campaign to which the creative belongs.

id.description: The unique identifier of the creative.

intendedStatus.description: The intended status of the creative.

account.description: The account associated with the creative.

leadgenCallToAction.description: Call-to-action information for lead generation purposes.
